duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead day-to-day operations and ensure excellent customer care and service.
Mentor and coach associates to optimize store processes.
Manage training, performance, and financials for store success.
Receive and manage merchandise deliveries and inventory.
Conduct analysis and make recommendations for process improvement.
Utilize scheduling software and ensure appropriate store opening and closing procedures.
Oversee cash transactions and bank deposits.

education_certification.credential: H.S. Diploma or General Education Degree (GED) required.
